# Thorne & Moorends (ward)

| population = 17,295

Thorne & Moorends—consisting of the town of Thorne, plus Moorends and Waterside—is one of 21 electoral wards in the Metropolitan Borough of Doncaster, South Yorkshire, England. It forms part of the Doncaster North and Don Valley parliamentary constituencies. Thorne and Moorends elect three councillors to Doncaster Metropolitan Borough Council currently held by Labour. In 2011 it had a population of 17,295. The ward was formed in 2015.
